programme.title: HD Hits!
programme.desc: We've got big hits and they're even bigger in high def baby!

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep32
programme.desc: A Grim Retreat - The Riders head to a tropical island for fun in the sun, not realizing it's infested with Grimora Leeches which drives their dragons to turn on them.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep33
programme.desc: To Heather Or Not To Heather - When Heather and Windshear land on Dragon's Edge to join the Dragon Rider crew, they quickly discover that Windshear doesn't play well with others.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep34
programme.desc: Stryke Out - Hiccup and Toothless are captured and must find a way to escape the Dragon Fighting arena and survive an attack from the fearsome Triple Stryke dragon.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep35
programme.desc: Tone Death - After the Riders save a Deathsong egg from the Dragon Hunters, they must take it back to Melody Island when the hatched baby won't stop crying.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep36
programme.desc: Between A Rock And A Hard Place - When Hiccup and the Riders discover that Viggo is using two captured Catastrophic Quakens to build a dragon prison, they must help the dragons escape.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep37
programme.desc: Family On The Edge - When Dagur comes to Dragon's Edge looking for Heather, Hiccup tries to keep the two siblings apart by teaching Dagur the art of Dragon Riding.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep38
programme.desc: Last Auction Heroes - When the Riders uncover the location of Viggo's Dragon Auction, they must stop him from selling dragons and stealing all the gold in Berk.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep39
programme.desc: Defenders Of The Wing Part 1 - The Defenders of the Wing are a local island tribe, which worships dragons and believe the Riders have stolen their protector – the Eruptodon dragon.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep40
programme.desc: Defenders Of The Wing Part 2 - Hiccup, Mala, Astrid, Fishlegs, and Snotlout go searching for the now captured Eruptodon, but little do they know that Viggo has a sinister plan.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep41
programme.desc: Gruff Around The Edges - When a distant cousin of the Twins named Gruffnut arrives on Dragon's Edge, Tuffnut tries to impress him, but Gruffnut may not be the hero he seems.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep42
programme.desc: Midnight Scrum - When Viggo puts a bounty on Hiccup's head, every Dragon Hunter in the world is after capturing Hiccup, so Toothless and the Riders must rescue him.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep43
programme.desc: Not Lout - When Snotlout screws up a mission, he must learn to be a leader and earn the trust of the other riders.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep44
programme.desc: Saving Shattermaster - When Mala and the Defenders of the Wing find a mysterious stranger who looks suspiciously like Dagur, Hiccup and Heather go to investigate.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep45
programme.desc: Dire Straits - Viggo gets angry at the dragon riders continually interfering with his business and uses a deep sea dragon, the Submaripper, to control Berk's trade.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep46
programme.desc: The Longest Day - During the week of the Midnight Sun where the sun doesn't set for a week, Hiccup must deal with sleep deprivation and a dangerous new dragon.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep47
programme.desc: Gold Rush - Hiccup and the Riders, with help from Dagur hatch a plan to steal Berk's gold back.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep48
programme.desc: Out Of The Frying Pan - When the Eruptodon can't take its egg into the Great Volcano, Hiccup and Fishlegs must go into the dangerous volcano with the egg before it's too late.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep49
programme.desc: Twintuition - When the Twins journey to the Northern Markets to fix their prized mace, they end up stumbling onto a secret project by Viggo and the Dragon Hunters.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep50
programme.desc: Blindsided - A huge storm hits Dragon's Edge causing the Dragons to spook and run off but when Astrid is blinded, Hiccup must lead her to Stormfly.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep51
programme.desc: Shell Shocked Part 1 - Hiccup doesn't know who to trust when Viggo and Ryker each tell him that the other has gone rogue, and is sidetracked when a new dragon attacks.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep52
programme.desc: Shell Shocked Part 2 - An extremely powerful new dragon attacks Dragon's Edge, and Hiccup makes a dangerous alliance while the fate of the Dragon Eye hangs in the balance.

programme.title: Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants - Space Ep47
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Aggravated Assault Of The Alien Armada - Oh, the indignity: George and Harold are forced to perform spa treatments on gigantic Biglyans. Also, Dr. Fitzgibbons reveals a shocking secret.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S2 Ep41
programme.desc: Game Plan - Boss tries to rename the local soccer team to "The Babies", but after Danny gets involved in the popularity race with his name, "The Hot Dogs", the town becomes divided. Boss creates a crack team of Baby Corp employees to game plan solutions to the worst outcomes.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep9
programme.desc: Boots - Jack Sprat steals enchanted boots from the Treasure House and triggers a dangerous Devil Wind that threatens to consume San Lorenzo's treasure.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep10
programme.desc: Patch Games/ Mark Twain - Sherman's scout troop, the Laser Robot Tiger Troopers, earn their merit badges on the show; Mark Twain's gift for gab wins back his lucky typewriter.

programme.title: Trollhunters Ep9
programme.desc: Bittersweet Sixteen - Jim is excited to test-drive a Vespa for his birthday but things quickly go awry when he must fight Bular's flying Vulture Troll sent to hunt him down.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep9
programme.desc: Quake, Rattle And Roll - Fishlegs and Meatlug liberate the Gronckles from a menacing dragon that has encroached on their ancestral home, Dark Deep.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep9
programme.desc: Out Of The Cave And Onto Thin Ice - After a shocking revelation, Po is determined to get his chi back and Jing decides to face Jindiao

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep15
programme.desc: Cyrano - Brian downloads some sketchy software that promises to make him cool. It works out great and everyone’s happy! (JK, it’s a huge disaster.)

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep35
programme.desc: Hitting The Sky Note / Hug Fest - When Poppy discovers that Sky Toronto doesn’t sing, she sets out to convince him that singing is the greatest joy in the world./Poppy shows Branch around his first Hug Fest, a Troll festival to celebrate hugs.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep35
programme.desc: Fast Food Lemur Nation - Tired of waiting so long for his meals, King Julien introduces “fast food” to the kingdom, but the side effects are not what he expected.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Rupert’S Magic Car - Miranda the Mermaid has never been able to visit Nutwood - until Rupert has a clever idea

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Rupert And The Unusual Birthday - It's Edward's birthday and Rupert wants to give him the best birthday party ever. Ping Pong tries to speed things up by using her magic but it turns everything topsy-turvy. How can Rupert give Edward his party now?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep13
programme.desc: Rumble In The Jungle - Zebby is upset when Raa Raa laughs at her rumbling tummy and runs off to hide. Raa Raa sets out to find his friend and apologise… he thinks it will be easy, he just has to listen out for the sound of her tummy, but who knew how many other rumbling noises there were?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep14
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Favourite Noise - Raa Raa is inspired by his friends to search for his favourite noise in the jingly jangly jungle. The little lion cub and his friends set out to find out what Raa Raa's Favourite Noise could be…

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep13
programme.desc: Postman Pat’S Camping Chaos - Lauren and Sara lead a camping trip to the Scottish Highlands, but disaster strikes when Ajay and PC Selby are stuck in Pencaster with the tent and cooking equipment. Pat must transport them to the Highlands in the SDS Plane and put up the tent before nightfall in order to accomplish his mission. When a Highland cow gets into the tent and refuses to leave, Pat comes up with a plan for Alf to team up with Bill and coax the cow out with their father-and-son cow call - and Bill helps Alf move his own cow, who turns out to be missing Bill.

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep14
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The King'S Armour - It's Knights and Dragons Day at school and Pat has to travel to a Welsh castle to pick up some ancient artefacts and Sarah Gilbertson's Auntie Jackie! Pat is rather partial to a suit of armour - and when he's presented with a real one at the castle, he can't resist trying it on! But the suit gets stuck shut, leaving the excitable children wondering where their artefacts are! As they wait, Sarah Gilbertson starts telling them tales of the mysterious Stone of Penrhys and her ancestor ‘King Gilbertson' and his knightly adventures, which Bill is loathe to believe. Unable to free himself from the suit of armour, Pat has no choice but to fly back Greendale wearing it! At the school, the children are enraptured when the plane lands and a real knight steps out! It must be ‘King Gilbertson'! To Sarah G's delight, Auntie Jackie emerges from the plane - and Bill becomes a hero when he discovers to real purpose of the mysterious Stone of Penrhys - it opens the suit of armour!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep65
programme.desc: Bumble'S Special Lunch - Fifi has invited the other tots over to lunch but she is not very well. Bumble gamely steps in and offers to cook for her. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep66
programme.desc: Fifi Misses Me Not - Bumble has gone off on a pollen collecting expedition. He wishes Fifi was with him. Meanwhile, back in the garden, Fifi is missing her best friend too.

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep22
programme.desc: Ghost In The Gallery / Wart On The Nose - Ghost in the Gallery After hearing reports of a ghost stealing artwork from the Deedstown Museum, Casper becomes convinced that his uncles are involved. Wart on the Nose When Professor Thurdigree Burns comes down with dragon flu, Casper, Mantha and Ra are tasked with finding a cure.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep7
programme.desc: Tears Of Balmera - Hunk and Coran search for a new power crystal on a living planet inhabited by an alien race imprisoned by Zarkon. Back at the Castle, Pidge sabotages Sendak's efforts to steal Voltron.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep7
programme.desc: The Dark Side Of The Moose: Chapter Two - Rocky and Bullwinkle encounter a young alien and set out on a mission to reunite him with his alien family but things get complicated when they accidentally lose him at an alien convention and Boris, Natasha and other eccentric billionaire Colonel Boudreaux are also after him

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep7
programme.desc: A Tale Of Two Turbos / The Escargot Affair - Turbo is surprised to learn that somebody in town is pretending to be him and must find the imposter before they can cause more trouble. // Turbo is invited to a fancy dinner party in his honor but learns that he is actually on the menu, so it's up to the crew to save him.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep10
programme.desc: Fake Ravine - When the Dinotrux settle together in the crater, D-Structs decides to go after their most important resource: the Reptools.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Senseless Torment Of The Space Toilet - Inspired by their favorite TV show, George and Harold — along with Principal Krupp — blast off to outer space, where an angry toilet awaits.

programme.desc: Night Owls - Boss arranges a sleepover with Quiet Psycho Baby to get access to her father the Mayor's day planner, hoping to plant his own pro-baby agenda. However, staying up all night has the unexpected consequence of delusional over-tiredness! Tim sneaks into an art film and decides he has to be a grown-up now, so Mom and Dad try to "kid" him up again.

But when the party is over, Detective Cooper – now “Chummy Sparklestone” – refuses to break character, and he’s causing problems around the village!

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep12
programme.desc: The Crood Who Knew Too Much/Scent Of A Thunk - When Thunk is so stinky he kills animals with his stench, he pretends to be a great hunter; A spider ant bite gives Grug the biggest brain in town.

programme.desc: Struck Through The Heart / Boov Up And Drive - Oh has an electric spark when he and Tip do the ultimate best friend handshake./Tip can't get Slushious back until she passes a Boovian Driver's Test.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Lucky And The Harvest Hunt - Lucky takes part in a secret Miradero tradition a nighttime scavenger hunt

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Slobber Power - Cutter gets a chance to be a "mom" when a newly hatched dragon bonds with him, and they'll both be needed to get the others out of a tangled mess.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep45
programme.desc: Why Puffadder Sheds His Skin - You see there was a time when Puff Adder didn't shed his skin. All the animals were afraid of Puff Adder because he was very difficult to see and he had a nasty bite. Puff Adder decides that if no beast wants to be his friend then he doesn't want to have any friends. He slithers far, far away to the desert where he bumps into Camel and learns that every animal needs a friend. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep46
programme.desc: Why Eagle Rules The Skies - You see there was a time when Eagle didn't rule the skies. She was a humble bird who kept herself to self. But then one day things start going wrong for the birds - some beast steals Hen's eggs, Hummingbird loses her hum and Tickbird goes missing! Eagle quietly saves the day and Lion rewards her with half his Kingdom. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep45
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Anchor - The Ninjas are giving a special display of acrobatics and climbing to Noddy, the Pirates and the Knights. It looks amazing! Noddy goes back to Toy Green to tell Big Ears all about it and narrowly misses being run over by the runaway Pirates Galleon. Someone has taken their sticky anchor and without it they've no way of stopping the ship! Noddy needs to investigate before there's an accident! He follows all the clues which leads him to the Knights. They'd been so impressed by the acrobatics of the Ninjas that they'd borrowed the sticky anchor to help them do acrobatics too! Noddy retrieves the anchor and the Knights apologise for causing such chaos. The Pirates didn't mind though – they LOVE racing about. Thanks to Noddy, the case is closed!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep46
programme.desc: The Case Of The Disappearing Traffic Cones - When the Builders' traffic cones disappear from their building site, there is chaos all over Brickabuild. Noddy decides to investigate right away and find out who's taken them. Did the Naughticorns take them for their obstacle course? Or was it Farmer Tom who used them to keep his animals under control. Noddy carefully follows the clues and at last discovers it was the Pirates who took them to use as markers for Stripes' Pirate Galleon Driving Test. Noddy tells them about the traffic chaos and the contrite pirates return the cones at once. Best of all – Pirate Stripes has passed her test! Well done Noddy, case closed!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep45
programme.desc: How Can I Cheer Up Kevin? - JESS, and his friends are looking after Kevin the carp while Horace goes to visit a friend. They decide to clean out HORACE'S pond for him and take all the yukky pond weed to the river where the hungry fishes gobble it up. But when they get back they find that KEVIN is unhappy in his pond. “How can I cheer up Kevin?” That's the Big Question. First JESS thinks that KEVIN might be lonely so they take it in turns to keep him company. But KEVIN seems even more unhappy than before. Jess thinks that KEVIN is probably hungry. They saw the fish in the river eating weed so they go back to the river to get some for KEVIN. KEVIN gobbles up the weed, but he's soon looking sad again. JESS thinks that maybe staying in one place all the time is making KEVIN unhappy. So he gives him a little holiday in the river. KEVIN really perks up. A holiday seems to be the answer. Except that as soon as he's back in his pond KEVIN is miserable again. Horace comes back and explains to them s how pond weed helps fish to breathe, Jess r

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep46
programme.desc: How Can We Decorate The Christmas Tree? - It's Christmas Eve on Greendale Farm. Jess is very very excited. Every year Mimi decorates the special tree in the woods and the friends all gather around to sing and play and open presents. But when Jess, Mimi and Willow arrive to leave presents at the tree they're shocked to see that the wind has blown all the decorations away! How dreadful! - How will they celebrate Christmas with no decorations? And Mimi can't help as she and Willow have promised to deliver presents outside the farm. Jess promises to work it out ‘How can we decorate the Christmas Tree?' – that's the Big Question!. He searches the farm for decorations but cannot find them. Then he realises he's found some lovely natural things that they can use to MAKE decorations. Yippety Yay! Of course! So everyone pulls together and gathers fircones and teasels, straw and bulrushes. programme.desc: Rupert And The Toy Soldiers - When Ping Pong's spell to fix a broken toy Soldier goes wrong Rupert and his friends need help from an unexpected source to get him back in the box.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep15
programme.desc: Ooo Ooo Slips Up - Raa Raa and the other animals keep slipping up on banana skins that are littering the jungle floor. Where could they have come from? Together the animals clear up the mess and discover who has been littering the jungle with banana skins.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep16
programme.desc: No Sleep Til Bedtime - It is nap time in the Jingly Jangly Jungle but Raa Raa is not tired and is determined to play hide and seek with his friends, whether they like it or not! But all this running about can be tiring work for a noisy little lion cub…

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep15
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Bouncing Bulb - Pat's Special Delivery is a very large, very fragile lighthouse bulb, and everything seems to be conspiring to make him break it! Falling timber, an out of control sofa, Bonnie the dog, high winds...! Pat's journey from the sorting office to Pencaster Bay is a minefield of hazards. Waiting for the bulb is lighthouse keeper Chris Beacon and his pet parrot Micawber, both anxious to get the lighthouse working before sundown, and tracking a storm blowing in. Out at sea are Alf and PC Selby, enjoying a day's fishing, until they drift off-course and need the lighthouse to guide them ashore...

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep16
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Lost Pigeon - The Thompson's family pigeon, Cedric, has been reported found in Northern Ireland. Pat must take Dorothy and Bill to help bring him back in the SDS Plane. Meanwhile Alf camps out at the sorting office, pining for his beloved Cedric's return. Once in Ireland, Pat meets the man who found Cedric and Dorothy manages to charm him down from his roof. Unfortunately an inopportune phone call from Alf startles cedric and causes him to take up a roost on a cliff face with a friendly puffin. With Alf causing chaos trying "help" Ben tidy up the Sorting office in Pencaster, Pat exercises his climbing skills to retrieve Cedric but it takes a brave abseil from Dorothy and Sean to finally lure the wayward bird back to its rightful owners.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep67
programme.desc: Pirate Primrose - The tots are playing at pirates, all except Primrose, who is being a princess, naturally. But guess which tot has the best pirating skills when they are needed

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep68
programme.desc: Primrose Loses It - Primrose has broken her new necklace and lost the beads. She is unconsolable. Violet holds a make and do party to replace the necklace

programme.desc: A Mail Whale Tale - When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Paddington Makes Pancakes / Paddington Plays Football - Paddington rescues Pancake Day after Mrs. Bird hurts her arms snowboarding and can't make pancakes. // Jonathan teaches Paddington football, but Paddington kicks the ball into Mr. Curry's garden. They decide to get it back by climbing over the fence.

programme.desc: Baby Alexander - Baby Alexander is too young to talk, until Peppa teaches him his first word.

programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Lighthouse - Granddad Dog takes Peppa, George and Danny Dog to visit Grampy Rabbit's lighthouse.

programme.desc: Smile Day - When Froga discovers that someone has scribbled a horrible frowny face one of her pumpkins in her garden, Anna and her are quite upset - especially since today is smile day!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep154
programme.desc: No Panic ! - Christopher needs to warn Froga to protect her strawberries since he ears a thunderstorm coming! It turns out, the noise of thunder comes from Bubu's new invention: the weather machine!

programme.desc: Tickety's Big Musical Morning - Good Morning! We celebrate morning routines with Tickety as we sing a brand-new wakeup song and play a timely game of Blue's Clues to figure out what special time is coming up.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep507
programme.desc: Shadows - Peppa and George realize that they have shadows and no matter what they do, they can't escape from them.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep160
programme.desc: Snow Dream - Bubu has fixed Froga's barometer and everyone is surprised when it says there will be snow today (on a warm summer day!). Everyone is excited, Bubu wants to make to make a five-seater sled! He gets upset, when they realize it was a false forecast!

programme.desc: Sami Reindeer Herding, Norway - The Go Jetters are in snowy Norway to learn about the Sami reindeer. The reindeers are migrating and need to get a ferry to their warmer summer home.

programme.desc: Christmas Island, Indian Ocean - The Go Jetters snap into action as Glitch seeks some festive cheer on Christmas Island.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep61
programme.desc: Close the Gate - The Teletubbies accidentally leave the Tiddlytubbies' gate open and some of them escape into Home Dome. The Teletubbies must find them all and then close the gate.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S5) Ep6
programme.desc: Dragon - Dee encourages a friend to say 'dragon' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of dragons!

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep3

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep32

programme.desc: Zoo-mergency! - After a zoo fundraiser goes wrong, Sid must save the day with her family!

programme.desc: My Cool Aunt Frey / The Cow Jumped Over the Spoon - Freya's quest to have fun with her nephew goes unruly when she reconnects with her inner-wild child. // Westbrook W. Sleet tracks the mysterious Standing Cow of the Lowlands, which he believes is loose in the city.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep208
programme.desc: The Box Smusher / Tie-Dye Eye - When multiple packages are found smushed, the Middlemost Post must discover the truth and clear their name. // Parker wakes up one morning with Tie-Dye Eye, and pretty soon, so does the entire mountain.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep504
programme.desc: Taken - The boy's imaginations run wild when Dave disappears. When they finally find him, they're convinced he's a zombie.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep505
programme.desc: The Curse of MacBeth - The Chipmunks don't want to perform in the school play, after learning of its curse.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep505
programme.desc: Zeela The Great - Simon's robot Geizmo becomes jealous of Jeanette's robot Zeela, until a sudden tragedy reveals Geizmo's true heart.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep506
programme.desc: Davey Boy - Alvin gets a taste of his own medicine when he zaps Dave with a youth ray, turning him into an irresponsible teen.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep230
programme.desc: High Sea Diving - SpongeBob wants to be the first sponge to dive all the way up to the surface of the ocean!

programme.title: Danger Force S01 Ep110
programme.desc: The Thousand Pranks War: Part I - An ancient Prank War re-ignites between Swellview and Rivalton, and ShoutOut's excellent sense for pranking is Danger Force's best hope for winning the conflict.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Secret Legacy Pt. 1 - Robby has trouble adjusting after their family's big move to the rural town of Witwicky, until he and his sister, Mo, discover the first-ever Earthborn Transformers.

programme.title: Star Trek: Prodigy S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Preludes - A Starfleet Admiral digs into the past of the Protostar crew. Meanwhile, the Diviner recalls his life's mission.

programme.title: The Loud House S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Dance, Dance Resolution / A Fair to Remember - It’s the Sadie Hawkins dance at school and Lincoln’s sisters have accidentally landed him four dates! // When Lincoln and Bobby become friends, Lori sets out to make Bobby jealous by hanging out with Clyde.

programme.title: Big Nate S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Valentine's Day of Horror - Nate has decided this Valentine's Day, he will finally profess his love for his dream girl in the form of a grand gesture, but the day of love quickly turns into a nightmare after Nate's "gift" gives the entire school food poisoning.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep132
programme.desc: Yours, Mine and Mine / Kracked Krabs - SpongeBob and Patrick buy a toy and have to learn to share it. // SpongeBob goes with Mr. Krabs to the Cheapest Crab Convention.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep107
programme.desc: Giant Squidward / No Nose Knows - When Squidward gets spritzed with plant growth spray, he becomes monstrously huge. // When Patrick realizes that he is the only one out of all his friends without a nose, he decides he needs to get a nose, too.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Hair Today, Gone Tomorrow / Dentist Trip - Parker finds a body hair, and the cloud assumes it's time to become an adult! // During a trip to the dentist, Parker remembers how the S.S. Steadfast got shipwrecked on Mt. Middlemost.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep526
programme.desc: Appetite for Destruction / Frame on You - When Lily starts misbehaving at home, Mom and Dad think her new preschool friends might be the cause. // When Rusty is wrongfully suspended, the Action News Team leaps into action to clear his name.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep601
programme.desc: Present Danger / Stressed for the Part - Dressed as David Steele, Lincoln is on the hunt for his stolen birthday present before it's destroyed. // After landing a role in a Dairyland production, Luan must hide this news from Mrs. Bernardo, who she beat out.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Karma Chameleon / Team Effort - The Changs go on vacation, leaving Ronnie Anne and her cousins to look after Cam, the chameleon snake. // Ronnie Anne and her skate buddies work together to show their coach they can make a good team.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Guess Who's Shopping for Dinner? / New Roomie - Abuela teaches Ronnie Anne that getting ingredients for dinner is no small task. // When Vito's apartment floods, the kids try to find an apartment that suits him best.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep101
programme.desc: First Delivery / Chore or Less - While delivering a letter to a house that never gets mail, the gang goes through warfare to get to its front door. // In an attempt to be more like Angus, Parker does the chores and realizes that they're actually boring.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep102
programme.desc: BURT! The Musical / Sunday No FunDay - When Angus accidentally throws Burt away, he and Parker must get him back from Greenwood's Recycle King. // After Angus tells Parker and Russell to leave the house on his day off, Parker wrongly assumes it's permanent.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep146
programme.desc: The Abrasive Side / Earworm - SpongeBob can never say "no" to anyone, so he orders a product called the "abrasive side". // SpongeBob gets a song stuck in his head.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep147
programme.desc: Hide and Then What Happens? / Shellback Shenanigans - SpongeBob and Patrick play Hide N' Seek and SpongeBob searches the world for Patrick. // Plankton masquerades as Gary to steal the Krabby Patty formula.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep148
programme.desc: The Masterpiece / Whelk Attack - Squidward sculpts a statue of Mr. Krabs for The Krusty Krab. // Giant sea whelks terrorize the folks of Bikini Bottom.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep149
programme.desc: You Don't Know Sponge / Tunnel of Glove - SpongeBob and Patrick take a friendship test. // Pearl is embarrassed when she must sit next to SpongeBob in the Tunnel of Glove.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Princess & the Po - When Po is asked to bring a young princess to the King of the Qidan to make a peace offering, they learn that an agreement between the two kingdoms will come at a cost.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Chain Reaction - After the Croc Bandits steal Shifu's favorite ruby-encrusted statue of Oogway from Po and Tigress, the two warriors must team up to get the statue back and return it home.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep211
programme.desc: The Desert - Aang searches for Appa, while Katara struggles to keep everyone together so they can survive in the vast desert. Meanwhile, Uncle and Zuko seek help from an ancient secret society.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep221
programme.desc: Brain Drain - Kowalski's attempt to super charge his brain backfires. Instead of becoming a mega genius he's now dumber than mud.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep239
programme.desc: The Big Move / Endangerous Species - The penguins notice it's been quiet at night. Too quiet, something's amiss. // The penguins make a new friend in Dode the dodo bird, who they clone back into existence after a pesky bout of extinction.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Littlefoot / Smotherly Love - Marlene is dying to go see a concert in the park. But, every time she leaves the zoo she becomes a feral monster! // Ma, an empty-nested mother possum, takes up residence in the Penguins Lair after they destroy her home.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Diner Ducks / Switcheroo - After wracking up a huge bill at Pumpers, SwaySway and Buhdeuce level up into Diner Ducks to pay off their debt. // Things get awkward when the guys eat a loaf of Switcheroo Bread and swap bodies.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep111
programme.desc: I Will Survive - Our gang reaches the lair of Alvin the demon but must conquer a series of obstacles before they can get to Brendar's brother. They dance, solve riddles, and defeat a monster, when finally Brendar reaches her brother named Kendar.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Dorg's New Mom / Dorg Hates Olives - The gang need an adult escort to see the new Johnny Fist movie, so Yooki possesses Dorg's mom. // Dorg needs the Magicals' help to stomach his mom's icky Olive Surprise recipe. But instead, they accidentally turn the town into olive-loving zombies!

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Sleeping Yeti / The Sand Crab Man - Yana eats a witch's apple and instantly falls asleep so Felicity and Miguel have to find a way to break the spell. // Felicity is having fun at her party, she convinces the Sand Crab Man to take the night off, which causes chaos in Mythlandia.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Booger Johnson / Dream Rangers - Craig can’t stop eating Megan’s pet gerbil. // Sanjay and Craig must re-enter their dream to rescue Belle.

programme.title: Ollie's Pack S01 Ep127
programme.desc: Getting Oldie With It / Lil' Baby Ollie - After Ollie, Cleo and Bernie use an age-up monster to get into the movies, Bernie experiences the joys of being old. // Ollie impresses the coolest kids in school but now he's got to watch a scary movie featuring his biggest fear, geese.

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Fangboy / Monster in the Mist - Fanboy is convinced he was bitten by a vampire and Chum Chum wants to be a vampire, too. // Boog mistakenly thinks he sees a monster on the loose in the Frosty Mart and has to rely on Fanboy and Chum Chum to keep him safe.

programme.title: Rugrats S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Traditions - When Tommy's first Hanukkah falls on Christmas Eve, the Pickles family has to juggle their family traditions to make sure each feels important, while also celebrating Las Posadas with Betty and her family.

programme.title: Winx Club S06 Ep610
programme.desc: The Secret Greenhouse - Back at Alfea, Selina poses as an ally to the Winx as they track down Eldora's favorite flower. But when the greenhouse plants attack, Selina deceives Bloom, causing her to almost poison Flora. Can Bloom forgive herself?

programme.title: Winx Club S06 Ep611
programme.desc: Broken Dreams - Bloom, still upset from putting Flora in danger, spends some time to herself in Gardenia. When the Pixies come to cheer Bloom up, they are attacked by the Legendarium's evil vampires. Can the Winx get there in time to help?

programme.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Longest Fight / Hypno! Part Deux - The Turtles have a hard time watching their idol skateboard while stopping a burglary. // Hypno-Potamus returns and causes havoc at April's homecoming dance.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep221
programme.desc: No Pictures, Please / Stuck on the Roof - Patrick leads an enthusiastic stranger on a tour of his favorite places in Bikini Bottom. // SpongeBob is afraid to get off the roof of the Krusty Krab, but he won't let that stop him from living his life!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep222
programme.desc: Krabby Patty Creature Feature / Teacher's Pests - A new secret Krabby Patty formula has disastrous results for Bikini Bottom, and only SpongeBob can save the day. // Mr. Krabs and Plankton have to take boating school classes. Thankfully, SpongeBob's there to show them the ropes!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep223
programme.desc: Sanitation Insanity / Bunny Hunt - When Mr. Krabs gets in trouble for littering, he makes SpongeBob and Squidward clean up Bikini Bottom. // A sea bunny ravages Squidward's garden, but SpongeBob thinks it's cute!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep224
programme.desc: Squid Noir / Scavenger Pants - When his clarinet goes missing, Squidward must become a hardboiled detective to track it down. // Squidward sends SpongeBob and Patrick on an increasingly difficult scavenger hunt to get them out of his hair.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep253
programme.desc: Jolly Lodgers / Biddy Sitting - Squidward packs his bags after his house gets infested, but a different kind of pest waits at his hotel. // SpongeBob and Patrick get tricked into babysitting a grouchy old lady, who does all she can to escape.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep421
programme.desc: The Littlest Robot - Simon invents a robot with emotions and an ability to learn which backfires when he's exposed to the internet.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep422
programme.desc: You Troll - The chipmunks try to keep Dave from getting on the internet after a performance he posts gets negative comments.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep422
programme.desc: Life of the Party - The Chipmunks along with Kevin and Cheesy decide to crash BoCarter's birthday yacht party after not being invited.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep208

programme.title: What's The Big Deal? Ep2
programme.desc: Botanical Power - The pretty house plant as a superhero? Get ready to be surprised at the superpowers that plants and fungi have. Host Rishi Budhrani finds out how they could be key to fighting climate change.

programme.title: Secret Lives Of Trees Ep2
programme.desc: The Casuarina Riddle [English Subtitles] - There are around 3,000 Casuarinas in Singapore but 2,000 of them have appeared mysteriously in Coney Island. How did these Casuarina trees take over the marshy uninhabitable environment of the island?

programme.title: Asia Tonight
programme.desc: CNA correspondents bring you the top stories of the day with 'live' reports and interviews to keep you up-to-date on the day's events.

programme.title: Slumfood Millionaire Ep6
programme.desc: Dharavi, Mumbai [English Subtitles] - Meet Dharavi slum's most famous Chinese-Indian cook serving delectable fusion treats with his signature sauce, and an idliwalla who shares his secret recipes for fluffy idlis and crunchy vadas.

programme.title: The Year Ahead 2023: World Ep2

programme.title: Secret Delicious Ep2

programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep27
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Road To UFC Ep5
programme.desc: ROAD TO UFC is a ground-breaking “win and advance” tournament that gives top MMA prospects from Asia a pathway to a UFC contract. Eight mixed martial arts athletes will compete in each of four men’s weight classes: flyweight, bantamweight, featherweight and lightweight. The opening round is divided into four episodes, each of which includes four tournament bouts and one additional non-tournament bout. These non-tournament bouts are included for promising prospects whose divisions might not have been included in ROAD TO UFC.

programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.
